page.title: 04FOLK TALES
page.content: Miss Guinn_is a{ghost}in the churchyard.She prays there everynight. The pit deputy_In{Shireoaks}pit the deputy who looked after the workings he went to explore the old{mines}and this man came and asked the deputy what the time was.(The deputy had brown hair.)and then when he had told him the time he walked straight through the deputy and the deputy came out with white hair. Paddy_when they were rebuilding the stone walls at{Thorpe}there was a man called Paddy and he was an{Irish} tramp,they found him dead there and people say they saw his ghost. {The 9th Roman Legion_}disappeard off the earth in the matter of a day, their bodies were never found and on {Mid summer night}they are supposed to march on{Packman lane}and one day a man was found with a{spear}in his back
